function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited implementation of AI and machine learning in healthcare","Impact":"Inability to fully utilize advanced technologies for healthcare support","Mitigation":"Increase education and training on AI and machine learning for healthcare professionals","Technologies":"AI and machine learning","People":"Healthcare professionals and patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and technology providers"},{"Description":"Potential reliance on AI and machine learning for critical healthcare decisions","Impact":"Risk of errors or misdiagnosis if AI and machine learning are not properly validated and monitored","Mitigation":"Establish rigorous validation processes and continuous monitoring of AI algorithms","Technologies":"AI and machine learning","People":"Healthcare professionals and patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Privacy and security risks in IoT and drone technology","Impact":"Loss of sensitive health data and potential misuse of surveillance capabilities","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption and security measures, and strict data access controls","Technologies":"IoT and drone technology","People":"Healthcare professionals and patients","Owner":"Technology providers, healthcare organizations, and regulatory bodies"}]}
